newsletter.newsletter_text: When you sign up for our newsletter today

product_page.shipping_and_returns: Free ground shipping on all domestic US order with a pretax value of $150 or higher. All domestic orders of full price items can be returned or exchanged with a $15 restocking fee. Merchandise marked "Final Sale" cannot be returned.

consistent_cart_addon.merge_cart_text: It seems you already have a cart from a previous session. Would you like to merge your previous cart with your current cart?
